title: Angles
creator_credit: Jean Nunn, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description: This film shows how to calculate angles, heights and distances using formulae, and provides practical applications such as the felling of a tree and the radius and distance walked by a horse during training. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
